def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_x_smallest = x == smallest([x, y, z], ctx)
        check_y_grey = is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_medium_size = is_medium_size(y, ctx)
        check_y_top_x = is_above(y, x, ctx)
        check_z_light_grey = is_light(z, ctx) and is_grey(z, ctx)
        check_z_largest = z == largest([x, y, z], ctx)
        if (
            check_x_dark
            and check_x_smallest
            and check_y_grey
            and check_y_medium_size
            and check_y_top_x
            and check_z_light_grey
            and check_z_largest
        ):
            results.append([x, y, z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    return state
state = select(state)
